attributes.action: Please provide private land for cars/bikes to meet and show off their vehicles.
attributes.additional_details: There was a carmeet in Hayes the other night and was very annoyed with the noises. So thought i would try and start a petition for all car/bike lovers. As I do understand they want an area for them to show off the rides
attributes.background: Private land away from houses would be better as there will be less/no noice complaints and will not be reports of people driving irraticly around the area.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about matters which are not the responsibility of Government or Parliament. 

Neither the Government nor Parliament is responsible for providing private land. 

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to require local authorities to provide areas for cars/bikes to meet and show off their vehicles, if that is what you would like to happen. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a new petition.
